title.en: Prayer of Aspiration for the Buddhist Teachings to Flourish in Taiwan

text.en: From the vast dharmakāya expanse of primordial purity free from complexity,
text.en-trans: kadak trödral chökü long yang lé

text.en: The spontaneously present rūpakāya blazes with the splendour of the signs and marks,
text.en-trans: lhündrub zukku tsenpé pal barwa

text.en: And skilfully brings down a shower of Dharma from the clouds of loving kindness—
text.en-trans: tuk tsé trin lé chö char beb khepa

text.en: Lord of sages, supreme teacher of gods and humans, playfully appear in the centre of my heart.
text.en-trans: tubwang lhami tön chok nying ü rol

text.en: In the centre of the protective sphere of the deep blue ocean,
text.en-trans: ting dzin ma gu ra yi sung gur ü

text.en: Is this land that is like an arena of perfect abundance and beauty—
text.en-trans: dzé duk pünsum tsokpé do ra ru

text.en: Here, through the splendour of the two systems1and four aspects of well-being,2
text.en-trans: luk nyi dé zhi pal la longchö pé

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through guarding the key instructions for turning the mind toward the Dharma—
text.en-trans: lona chö la gyurwé mengak né

text.en: The rarity of the freedoms and opportunities and the impermanence of life,
text.en-trans: daljor nyé ka tsé la takpa mé

text.en: As well as the sufferings of cyclic existence and the effects of actions,
text.en-trans: khorwa dukngal lé dré rab sung né

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through the stages of practice that bring progress in genuine Dharma—
text.en-trans: yangdak chö lam drowé rimpa ni

text.en: Taking refuge in the Three Jewels, training in love and compassion,
text.en-trans: könchok kyamdro jam dang nyingjé dang

text.en: Gathering the two accumulations and purifying the two obscurations,
text.en-trans: tsok nyi sak dang drib nyi jangwa yi

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through the practice of guru yoga which dispels all adversity,
text.en-trans: galkyen kün sel lamé naljor dang

text.en: Instructions on the swift path of transference (phowa) and so on,
text.en-trans: nyurlam powé mengak nyamlen sok

text.en: And with confidence in finding a path to liberation at the time of death,
text.en-trans: chi tsé tarlam tobpé deng denpé

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through transforming impure, deluded perception into perception that is pure,
text.en-trans: ma dak trulnang dakpar wang gyurwé

text.en: While experiencing deity, mantra and dharmakāya as the self-radiance of awareness and emptiness,
text.en-trans: riktong rang dang lha ngak chökü ngang

text.en: And the channels, wind-energies and essences as supports for bliss and emptiness,
text.en-trans: tsa tik lung sum detong drok sharwé

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through recognising one’s own nature of primordially pure awareness and emptiness,
text.en-trans: riktong kadak rang ngo shepa dang

text.en: And with decisive certainty about its creative manifestations, pure and impure,
text.en-trans: dak dang ma dak tsalnang takchö né

text.en: So that one gains the confidence of self-liberation beyond hope and fear,
text.en-trans: rangdrol redok dralwé deng tobpé

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Without getting caught in clinging to space, light-spheres and awareness,
text.en-trans: sherab rang jung drönmé rang dang lé

text.en: Which arise as the natural radiance of the lamp of self-arisen wisdom—
text.en-trans: ying tik rik sum dzinpé maching par

text.en: Through skilful practice of these most secret, unsurpassable teachings—
text.en-trans: yangsang lamé nyam su len khepé

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as the master Xuanzang, who took birth in China,
text.en-trans: tsi né yul trung tang sin lama yi

text.en: Travelled, through his magnificent aspirations, to the noble land of India,
text.en-trans: lab chen tukkyé damché pakyul kyö

text.en: Where, through enduring hardships, he reached the pinnacle of scholarship,
text.en-trans: kawa chö né khepa pul chin zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as the great elder noble Kaśyapa and the rest,
text.en-trans: neten chenpo pakpa ösung sok

text.en: In their line of succession, skilfully upheld the teachings,
text.en-trans: té rab zhindu tenpa dzin khepé

text.en: Now with saffron-robed monks adorned with threefold training—
text.en-trans: lab sum gyen chang ngur mik dzinpa yi

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as in the Land of Snows, as the Buddha himself foretold,
text.en-trans: gangjong tubpé lung du tenpa zhin

text.en: Through the force of Avalokiteśvara’s vows and aspirations,
text.en-trans: chenrezik wang tukkyé damché tü

text.en: A pair of dharma kings appeared to herald a new dawn,
text.en-trans: chögyal zung gi nam lang nyishar tar

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as Atiśa, heart-son of the precious lord of Suvarnadvīpa
text.en-trans: jowo serlingpa yi tuk kyi sé

text.en: And pre-eminent among the learned and accomplished of the noble land,
text.en-trans: pakyul khedrub pul chin ati shé

text.en: Set the torch of the Kadampa teachings ablaze—
text.en-trans: kadam tenpa drönmé barwa zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: By practising according to the instructions of Marpa of Lhodrak,
text.en-trans: lho drak marpé ka zhin drub dzepé

text.en: Holding aloft the golden victory banner of the practice lineage,
text.en-trans: drub gyü tenpé ser gyi gyaltsen dzin

text.en: Just like Milarepa, who attained liberation in a single lifetime,
text.en-trans: mi la repa tsé dir drolwa zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyengpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as the fame of the Sakya tradition spread throughout the world,
text.en-trans: sakya zheja sateng drakpé khyab

text.en: And caused the two traditions to flourish once again in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangjong luk nyi lar yang dargyé dzé

text.en: So that supremely learned scholars congregated in every direction—
text.en-trans: khepé wangpo chok kün khyabpa zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as the glorious Jonangpas skilfully propagated the teachings
text.en-trans: khorlo tama lamé dükhor gyi

text.en: Of Kālacakra and the unsurpassed final turning of the Dharma-wheel
text.en-trans: gyalten pel khé palden jo nangpé

text.en: And caused teachings on the ‘essence of definitive meaning’ to spread,
text.en-trans: ngedön nyingpo tenpa darwa zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Just as Lobzang Drakpa, who was prophesied by the victorious lord Padma,
text.en-trans: gyalwang pemé lung dzin lobzang drak

text.en: Followed many learned adepts and won the splendour of threefold excellence,
text.en-trans: khedrub mang ten zang sum pal gyi chuk

text.en: To become skilled in upholding Buddha’s teaching that unites sūtra and mantra,
text.en-trans: do ngak zungdrel tubten dzin khé zhin

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyal ten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through the blossoming of the lotus garden of non-sectarian Buddhist teachings,
text.en-trans: rimé gyalten pemö tsal zhé né

text.en: Pacifying threats from external enemies and hindrances as well as the four elements,
text.en-trans: chi yi dragek jung zhi nö zhi dang

text.en: Dispelling the poison of internal attachment, aversion and ignorance,
text.en-trans: nang gi chakdang mongpé duk sel né

text.en: And secretly maturing the mindstream through bodhicitta—the spirit of awakening,
text.en-trans: sangwa changchub sem kyi gyü min té

text.en: May the essence of the Buddha's teachings flourish in this land!
text.en-trans: ling dir gyalten nyingpo dargyé shok

text.en: Through the blessings of the Three Jewels, Three Roots and guardian deities,
text.en-trans: chok sum tsa sum sungmé jinlab dang

text.en: And through the power of the truth of my own pure altruistic intention,
text.en-trans: dak gi lhaksam dakpé den tob kyi

text.en: May all disharmony, adversity and signs of deterioration be pacified,
text.en-trans: mitün galkyen güpa kün zhi né

text.en: And may all be auspicious so that lifespan, merit, glory and prosperity increase!
text.en-trans: tsesö palyön gyepé tashi shok
